name: GreenBox Group Ltd
tag_list: energy-efficiency, smart-energy, smart-home, smart-meter, smartbox, cloud, negawatt
overview:
White label, home energy management, seamlessly integrated with smart energy business models, enhanced customer care & automated demand response.

GreenBox makes it easy for consumers to understand how they’re using power, how they can save and even takes care of it for them – taking the pain out of becoming energy efficient through a revolutionary home energy management service. And for utilities GreenBox provide game changing tools and business models to help make money whilst you help your customers.

Engaging consumers is vital for success in “smart energy”. GreenBox have combined circuit and appliance level monitoring and control, with sophisticated applications and data analysis to deliver real consumption insight and effortless, set-and-forget energy management for utility customers.

And GreenBox unique GreenBox’s crowd computing architecture distributes household data and apps to a smartbox computer in the home. This enables granular energy management and enterprise grade scalability, performance and security with the lowest total cost of ownership compared to traditional gateway or purely cloud based architectures.

GreenBox integrates the monitoring and control of electricity and/or gas, water usage and provides real-time direct feedback to consumers through a personalised portal.
